hero.headline: QR Orders for Your Food Truck
hero.subtitle: Let customers scan, order, and pay — all from their phone. No app download needed. Boost your sales and cut wait times with FoodTruck QR.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Powerful features for food truck owners and a seamless experience for customers.

qr_menu.title: QR Code Menu
qr_menu.description: Generate unique QR codes for your truck. Customers scan and instantly see your full menu.

mobile_orders.title: Mobile Orders
mobile_orders.description: Receive orders directly on your device. No more mishearing orders in a noisy environment.

payments.title: Easy Payments
payments.description: Accept card payments seamlessly. No cash handling, no card terminals needed.

find_trucks.title: Find Nearby Trucks
find_trucks.description: Customers can discover food trucks near them and browse menus before visiting.

quick_order.title: Quick Ordering
quick_order.description: Order in seconds — just scan, pick your items, and pay. Skip the line entirely.

order_tracking.title: Order Tracking
order_tracking.description: Real-time notifications when your food is being prepared and ready for pickup.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in four simple steps.

step1.title: Set Up Your Menu
step1.description: Create your digital menu with photos, descriptions, and prices in minutes.

step2.title: Customer Scans QR
step2.description: Display your unique QR code. Customers scan it with their phone camera.

step3.title: Order & Pay
step3.description: Customers browse your menu, place their order, and pay — all in-browser.

step4.title: Food Ready!
step4.description: You get the order instantly. Notify the customer when it's ready for pickup.

benefits.title: Why FoodTruck QR?
benefits.subtitle: Benefits that make a real difference for your business and your customers.
benefits.owner3: Reduce wait times and serve more customers

benefits.customer2: Skip the line and order from anywhere nearby
benefits.customer4: Get notified when your food is ready
